name: Elementary Analysis
subtitle: The Theory of Calculus
author: Kenneth A. Ross
subject: Real Analysis
description: A comprehensive collection of advanced number theory problems, covering topics from elementary number theory to algebraic number theory and analytic methods.

name: Calculus
subtitle: 4th Edition
author: Michael Spivak
subject: Calculus
description: An extensive workbook covering fundamental concepts in abstract algebra, with a focus on group theory, ring theory, and field theory.

name: Basic Mathematics
subtitle: Springer Mathematics Texts
author: Serge Lang
subject: Algebra
description: A comprehensive collection of exercises in real analysis, progressing from basic concepts to advanced topics in measure theory and functional analysis.

name: Kiselev's Geometry
subtitle: Book I: Planimetry
author: A.P. Kiselev
subject: Geometry
description: An introduction to topology through carefully selected problems, covering point-set topology, algebraic topology, and differential topology.

name: Kiselev's Geometry
subtitle: Book II: Stereometry
author: A.P. Kiselev
subject: Geometry
description: A comprehensive workbook on linear algebra, featuring problems on vector spaces, linear transformations, eigenvalues, and matrix theory.

name: Precalculus
subtitle: With Limits & A Graphing Approach
author: Larson, Hostetler, Edwards
subject: Precalculus
description: An advanced collection of problems in differential geometry, focusing on the theory of curves, surfaces, and manifolds.

name: Baby Rudin
subtitle: Principles of Mathematical Analysis
author: Walter Rudin
subject: Real Analysis
description: A detailed workbook covering complex analysis, from basic complex functions to advanced topics in conformal mapping and Riemann surfaces.

name: Papa Rudin
subtitle: Real and Complex Analysis
author: Walter Rudin
subject: Complex Analysis
description: An introduction to category theory through exercises, covering categories, functors, natural transformations, and their applications.

name: Grandpa Rudin
subtitle: Functional Analysis
author: Walter Rudin
subject: Functional Analysis
description: A comprehensive collection of problems in algebraic geometry, from classical varieties to modern scheme theory.

name: Trigonometry
subtitle: Master Basic Trig Skills
author: Chris McMullen, Ph.D.
subject: Trigonometry
description: An extensive workbook covering mathematical logic and set theory, including formal systems, model theory, and axiomatic set theory.

subject: Precalculus
description: An extensive workbook covering mathematical logic and set theory, including formal systems, model theory, and axiomatic set theory.
